programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
From soaring trance to peak-time anthems, here are 30 timeless Balearic Beats that defined a generation. Hands up, eyes shut!
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
Join Stephanie Hirst as she chooses her 50 most iconic but very proper clubland classics of all time! Banger after banger, this will not disappoint.

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!

Some say trance is the greatest genre of dance music ever. Make your own mind up as we give you the definitive euphoric anthems. What's your favourite?
Broom Cupboard legend and Heart Radio club maestro Toby Antis presents his selection from the ultimate decade of dance - the 1990s!
Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
40 blistering tracks from the current era. Featuring heavyweight hitters like Calvin Harris, David Guetta, Doja Cat, Lady Gaga, and more. Ding ding - Round 1!
We give you heavy hits, vocal anthems, dirty beats and bangin' basslines. This is the 2010s at it finest!
The ultimate throwback! We're bringing you the hottest Clubland belters from 1990 to 1999. Dust off those dancing shoes and pump the party!
Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
Let's go way back with some classic throwback hits, long forgotten beats and some good old fashioned rave anthems!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!

The 90s was obviously the greatest decade for dance, wasn't it? We pitch the 50 best 90s dance anthems against the 50 biggest bangers of the 00s. Who wins? You decide!
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the naughties!
Kickstart your weekend with Clubland's electrifying 00s Warm Up! Get ready for non-stop floorfillers with over 50 iconic party anthems from 2000 to 2009.
The weekend has landed so let's get it started the Clubland way. No less than four hours of 90s floor fillers and party starters! Over 50 fab anthems from 1990 to 1999.
